title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: Dumpling Mountain Cam
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams     Dumpling Mountain Cam                Dumpling Mountain Cam       The Dumpling Mountain webcam feed may stream unreliably on this website. Please visit the Dumpling Mountain cam on explore.org for more reliable access.         Location: Dumpling Mountain, approximately 3 miles (4.8 km) from Brooks Falls.    When to Watch: Year-round   What to Look For: This cam shows alpine tundra as well as sunrises, sunsets, and spectacular lake and mountain scenery.  If you desire a more interactive experience, please head on over to our webcam partner's website, explore.org. They have all of the cams, plus chat and social media connections, and be sure to download the eBooks on Katmai’s bears. These books are free and have lots of photos of the bears, their life histories, videos, maps. Questions? Browse the Bearcam Frequently Asked Questions.   View other webcams: Brooks Falls Lower River River Watch Riffles Naknek River
